Stifel analyst Steven Wieczynski said Carnival released preliminary results for Q2 that "are somewhat irrelevant at this point given the global pause in ship operations," but also gave updates that provide some positives but also some negatives and uncertainties. On the positive side, monthly cash burn is now slightly lower than his previous estimate and he thinks Carnival currently has about nine months of liquidity in a non-revenue environment. Also positive, the company said it has preliminary agreements for the disposal of six ships and the company has seen an improvement in booking trends for 2021 over the last six weeks. On the negative side, 50% of guests are now requesting cash refunds, up from 36% in mid-May. Also, Carnival noted they will be looking to further enhance liquidity and "while technically not a negative strategy," the language "will probably scare investors in the near-term," Wieczynski said. While he would expect to see a negative reaction to this morning's release, as the negatives outweigh the positives, Wieczynski said his Buy rating "remains firmly intact" and his price target remains $30 for Carnival shares.

上場失3球失3分，大衛路爾斯肯定責無旁貸，但阿仙奴的爭勝心也實在差勁，在中場加列沙卡傷出加上少踢1人後，整隊好像無心戀戰，就算有王牌射手奧巴美揚也毫無攻力，被藍月輕鬆壓制。

白禮頓排在第15位，沒有太大降班威脅，但也未肯定安全，所以仍然要全力爭勝。他們今季戰績硬淨，首循環就曾作客以2:1爆冷擊敗阿仙奴，今場也有機會令對方今季初嚐聯賽連敗
